name: 小人书·连环画  xiaorenshu
description:
小人书·连环画

[ENG version below]

和沁彩一样，本模型也会不断完善，请期待后续各种风格的版本！

Like Colorwater, this model will continue to be improved, so look forward to the subsequent versions in various styles!

20世纪初叶，在上海形成并开始广泛流传的通俗图画读物始称连环画，俗称“小人书”。中华人民共和国成立后，连环画作为一种通俗的传播文化的艺术形式得到迅速发展，形成中国现代美术的一个主要画种。谨以此LOAR模型纪念这种离我们越来越远的艺术风格。

（但有些模型会有一种非常令人脑洞大开的艺术效果，出乎意料，XD）

In the early 20th century, popular pictorial books formed in Shanghai and began to circulate widely were called comic books, commonly known as "Little People's Books". After the founding of the People's Republic of China, comic books developed rapidly as a popular art form for spreading culture, forming one of the main types of modern Chinese art.
This LOAR model commemorates this art style that is getting farther and farther away from us.
(But some models will have a very mind-blowing artistic effect, unexpectedly, XD)

使用说明：

请注意阅读位于版本页面右侧的更新说明！这里只更新参数类问题了。

Please pay attention to the update notes located on the right side of the version page! Only parameter class issues are updated here.

v2.0版本：

  • 同1.5版本

v1.5版本：

  • CFG<8，权重<=0.9

  • 不同的CFG会带来背景和细节的变化，请自行尝试。

v1.0版本：

  • 原始风格所使用的推荐设置：CFG=3，权重=0.9

  • 一些二次元模型使用高CFG后会得到一种奇妙的抽色效果，有兴趣的请尝试

Instructions for v1.5:

  • CFG<8，权重<=0.9

  • Different CFG's will bring changes in background and details, please try it yourself.

Instructions for v1.0:

  • Original style recommended settings: CFG=3, weight=0.9

  • Some Anime models will get a wonderful color pumping effect after using high CFG, please try if you are interested

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
我们现在进入了彩色时代，可以更好的用传统色调来表现一些二次元模型了，多人场景依然可以发挥出很多故事画面，期待您的创作！

We are now entering the era of color, you can better use the traditional tone to show some anime models, multiplayer scenes can still play a lot of story screen, look forward to your creation!

modelVersions.name: v1.5
modelVersions.description:
多人场景显著改善，你可以从例图中得到更多灵感。得益于数据集本身的故事性，画面感明显更有趣了

强烈推荐尝试骑马动作，有惊喜也有惊吓，毕竟马有四条腿，出问题的可能性大增。

添加了两个触发词“sgyy”“shz”，可以在使用一些三次元模型时改变一些人物的服装风格，比如例图中的三个大汉

Multiplayer scenes are significantly better, and you can get more inspiration from the example images. Thanks to the storytelling of the dataset itself, the graphics feel significantly more interesting.

Highly recommended to try the horse riding action, there are surprises and scares, after all, the horse has four legs and the possibility of problems is greatly increased.

Added two trigger words "sgyy" and "shz", which can change the clothing style of some characters when using some realistic models, such as the three guys in the example picture.
